statements: SELECT user_id, display_name, favorite_color, sleep_pattern, wake_up_time, temperature_preference FROM smart_home_preferences;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT display_name, favorite_color FROM smart_home_preferences WHERE temperature_preference > 25;
SELECT user_id, wake_up_time FROM smart_home_preferences WHERE favorite_color = 'Blue';
SELECT user_id, display_name FROM smart_home_preferences ORDER BY temperature_preference DESC, user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT display_name, temperature_preference FROM smart_home_preferences WHERE favorite_color = 'blue';
SELECT display_name FROM smart_home_preferences WHERE wake_up_time BETWEEN '06:00:00' AND '08:00:00';
SELECT user_id, display_name, favorite_color FROM smart_home_preferences ORDER BY display_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_preferences WHERE temperature_preference > 25 ORDER BY temperature_preference ASC, display_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, theme, language, notification_preference FROM user_preferences;
SELECT theme, user_id FROM user_preferences ORDER BY theme DESC;
SELECT * FROM automation_patterns;
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_description FROM automation_patterns WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT theme, language FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, theme, notification_preference FROM user_preferences WHERE theme = 'Light';
SELECT * FROM automation_patterns WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM user_preferences WHERE notification_preference = TRUE);
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_description FROM automation_patterns WHERE user_id = 456 ORDER BY pattern_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(pattern_id) AS total_patterns FROM automation_patterns GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(pattern_id) > 2;
SELECT user_id, temperature_preference FROM user_preferences;
SELECT pattern_id, sleep_pattern, activity_pattern FROM user_patterns WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, recommendation_content, recommendation_date FROM automation_recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, lighting_preference, music_preference FROM user_preferences WHERE temperature_preference > 25;
SELECT user_id, sleep_pattern, work_pattern FROM user_patterns WHERE work_pattern = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, temperature_preference, lighting_preference, music_preference FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, sleep_pattern, activity_pattern, work_pattern FROM user_patterns WHERE activity_pattern = true;
SELECT user_id, recommendation_content, recommendation_date FROM automation_recommendations WHERE recommendation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, temperature_preference, music_preference FROM user_preferences ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, sleep_pattern, work_pattern FROM user_patterns WHERE sleep_pattern = true AND work_pattern = false;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, language FROM user_preferences WHERE theme = 'dark';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM usage_patterns;
SELECT user_id, device_id, action FROM usage_patterns ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM home_automation_devices WHERE device_type = 'light';
SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, theme, language FROM user_preferences WHERE theme = 'dark';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_recommendations FROM recommendations GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT u.user_id, u.theme, r.recommendation_id, r.message FROM user_preferences u JOIN recommendations r ON u.user_id = r.user_id;
SELECT r.user_id, r.recommendation_id, r.message, d.device_name FROM recommendations r JOIN home_automation_devices d ON r.user_id = d.device_id;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, preferred_temperature FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, preferred_lighting, preferred_music_genre FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, preferred_temperature, preferred_lighting, preferred_music_genre FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, preferred_lighting FROM user_preferences WHERE preferred_temperature = 25;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, preferred_temperature, preferred_lighting FROM user_preferences ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, preferred_music_genre FROM user_preferences WHERE preferred_temperature > 25;
SELECT user_id, preferred_music_genre, preferred_temperature FROM user_preferences WHERE preferred_lighting = 'Warm';
SELECT u.user_id, u.preferred_temperature, r.recommendation_title FROM user_preferences u JOIN automation_recommendations r ON u.user_id = r.user_id;
